professional_summary: Experienced Help Desk Manager with expertise in IT support and systems management. Skilled in leading operations and implementing technology strategies aligned with business goals.

key_responsibilities: Leading business unit operations and aligning technology strategies with organizational goals.
Configuring and launching enterprise helpdesk support systems and remote support applications.
Establishing Service Level Agreements and communication protocols based on business priorities.
Managing ERP systems and implementing five successful implementations over nine years.
Supporting the annual budget process with technical reporting and financial applications support.
Developing custom processes for financial services including Purchasing

education.degree: MS in Information Technology in Management
